description: NodeStatus provides information about the current state of a particular node managed by this operator.

currentDeploymentGeneration.description: currentDeploymentGeneration is the generation of the most recently successful deployment

lastFailedDeploymentErrors.description: lastFailedDeploymentGenerationErrors is a list of the errors during the failed deployment referenced in lastFailedDeploymentGeneration

lastFailedDeploymentGeneration.description: lastFailedDeploymentGeneration is the generation of the deployment we tried and failed to deploy.

nodeName.description: nodeName is the name of the node

targetDeploymentGeneration.description: targetDeploymentGeneration is the generation of the deployment we're trying to apply
